dc:title: Complains of Organized Charity, Cops
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes the ordeal of trying to find a bed for a two and a half year old child on a cold Winter night and the indignity they faced at the hands of the police. Finally, she gives her and her daughter Tamar's beds to the boy and his father.
